mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_review ( ireview, iorder, iproduct, iuser, req_review_pic, contents, product_score ) VALUES ( #{ireview}, #{iorder}, #{iproduct}, #{iuser}, #{reqReviewPic}, #{contents}, #{productScore} )

INSERT INTO t_review_pics ( ireview, review_pic ) VALUES
( #{ireview}, #{review_pic} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.ireview, A.nm, B.product_score, B.contents, B.created_at FROM t_user AS A JOIN t_review AS B ON A.iuser = B.iuser JOIN t_review AS C ON B.ireview = C.ireview WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser} ORDER BY B.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
mapper.delete: DELETE C FROM t_order_details AS A LEFT JOIN t_review AS B ON A.idetails = B.ireview LEFT JOIN t_review_pics AS C ON B.ireview = C.ireview WHERE B.ireview = #{ireview}
